titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the determination and deduction of interest on qualified education loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) treat education loan origination fees as tax deductible interest; (2) allow for accrual of interest on education loans; and (3) provide for the allocation of student loan payments to interest, fees, and principal.
